data.text:
2) meals
I guess 3 meals a day is a great amount for now. Breakfast usually is porridge with fruit and peanut butter. For lunch it depends on what I’m craving but I try to keep it savory. I’m still forced dinner by my parents so I’ll just eat what my family eats..
